resources.string: First place in our list goes to the excellent Moto E4 Plus. It\'s a cheap phone that features phenomenal battery life, a fingerprint scanner and a premium feel design, plus it\'s a lot cheaper than the Moto G5 below. It is a little limited with its power, but it makes up for it by being able to last for a whole two days from a single charge. If price and battery are the most important features for you, the Moto E4 Plus will suit you perfectly.
